comment: How long does it take for me to dial and activate a newly ported sim card ? ? Waiting . For last mins it says call failed , despite having storng signal strenght .
amr:
# ::snt How long does it take for me to dial and activate a newly ported sim card ? ? Waiting . For last mins it says call failed , despite having storng signal strenght .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / take-10
            :ARG0 (a / and
                  :op1 (d / dial-01
                        :ARG0 (ii / i))
                  :op2 (a2 / activate-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (c / card
                              :mod (s / sim)
                              :ARG1-of (p / port-02
                                    :ARG1-of (n / new-01)))))
            :ARG1 (a3 / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (w / wait-01
            :ARG1 ii)
      :snt3 (s2 / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
            :ARG1 (f / fail-01
                  :ARG1 (c2 / call-02))
            :time (l / last
                  :op1 (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (m2 / minute)))
            :concession (h / have-03
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (s3 / signal
                        :mod s3
                        :mod (s4 / solid)))))

comment: Hi ! That's not the experience we want you to have . Please DM us your Vodafone and an alternate number , so that we can have this checked and update you shortly - Vishu <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Hi ! That's not the experience we want you to have . Please DM us your Vodafone and an alternate number , so that we can have this checked and update you shortly - Vishu <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hi
            :mode expressive)
      :snt2 (e / experience-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1-of (w / want-01
                  :ARG0 (w2 / we))
            :domain (t / that))
      :snt3 (d / DM-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (p / phone-number-entity
                        :value "Vodafone")
                  :poss y2)
            :op2 (n / number
                  :ARG1-of (a2 / alternate-01))
            :purpose (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (c / check-01
                              :ARG0 (w3 / we)
                              :ARG1 (t2 / this))
                        :op2 (u / update-02
                              :ARG0 w3
                              :ARG1 y2
                              :time (s / short-07)))))
      :snt4 (p3 / person
            :name (n2 / name
                  :op1 "Vishu")))

comment: When can i get a call back .. Do I wait all night long ?
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (c / call-02
                  :ARG1 (ii / i)
                  :mod (b / back))
            :time (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (w / wait-01
            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (ii2 / i)
            :duration (n / night
                  :mod (a3 / all))))
